info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:32PM CDT until August 28 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Greene County in southwestern Illinois... Northern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... Northeastern Jersey County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 432 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kemper, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carlinville and Palmyra. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
